thread.title: New model for philanthropy? Wealthy techie courts fellow techies
thread.title_full: New model for philanthropy? Wealthy techie courts fellow techies - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joe Garofoli
title: New model for philanthropy? Wealthy techie courts fellow techies
text:
Photo: Michael Short, Special To The Chronicle 8550797|article-6476867|7 8550797|article-6476867|1 email_share_embed|photo-8550797|article-6476867|1 8550797|article-6476867|2 8550797|article-6476867|3 8550797|article-6476867|4 8550797|article-6476867|5 google_share_embed|photo-8550797|article-6476867|6 First Graduate is one of two Bay Area nonprofits in Epic Foundation’s first group of 20 beneficiaries. First Graduate is one of two Bay Area nonprofits in Epic...
There’s no shortage of do-gooders trying to entice rich tech moguls to donate to their cause. But Alexandre Mars believes he’s got an edge when he’s pitching tech moguls on his new philanthropic venture launching Tuesday: He’s one of them. First Graduate is one of two Bay Area nonprofits in Epic Foundation’s first group of 20 beneficiaries. First Graduate is one of two Bay Area nonprofits in Epic...
There’s no shortage of do-gooders trying to entice rich tech moguls to donate to their cause. But Alexandre Mars believes he’s got an edge when he’s pitching tech moguls on his new philanthropic venture launching Tuesday: He’s one of them.
